result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

from surety for return of bond money- APPROVED, 10/14/2022
Re: Waiver of Preliminary Examination and Order to Bindover

ADDRESS INFO for Devin C. Needham
Current: Homeless,   (Effective: 09-21-2022)
Prior: 1500 N 1st Street- 112, Wausau, WI 54403
Signed at MCJ 09.20.22
Preliminary Hearing on November 14, 2022 at 11:15 am.
Order Appointing Counsel - Amended (Includes 17CM1524, 17CM1904, 18CF233, 21CF1559, 22CF298, 22CF1039)

Clerk: Amy. 
Called:  11:01 a.m. 
INCLUDES 17CM1524, 17CM1904, 18CF233, 21CF1559, 22CF298, 22CF1039.
State appears by ADA Hannah Runde for ADA Kyle Mayo. 
Defendant appears in custody from MCJ with Atty Jerod Barkley. 

Date and time set for JPTC. 
COURT notes time limits need to be address in 22CF1039.
Atty Barkley advises he is not currently appointed in this file; 
COURT questions deft on employment/income; COURT appoints Atty Barkley on 22CF1039 and caps fees on this case $2500.00.

COURT addresses time limits in 22CF1039; Atty Barkley makes statement and will waive time limits. 
COURT finds good cause to waive time limits. 

COURT sets PH/SC in 22CF1039 for 11/14/22 at 11:15 a.m. 

Atty Barkley makes statement re: return of money seized; COURT advises Atty Barkley to file something in writing and to set hearing. 

Adj:  11:07 a.m.

Clerk: Becca. 
Case Called: 1:26 pm. 

Deft appears via video, in custody, pro se.  
Date and time set for review re: public defender representation prior to preliminary hearing. 
Court notes counsel has not yet been appointed. Court notes deft. has Atty Barkley on other open cases.
COURT finds good cause to extend time limits for preliminary hearing. 
PTC: 09/14/2022 @ 11:00 am, Branch 4 (already set) (also review status of counsel).

Review hearing on September 9, 2022 at 01:00 pm.

Judicial Pretrial - in court on September 14, 2022 at 11:00 am.

Absolute sobriety from and no possession of controlled substances except prescriptions taken as prescribed. Report to ATTIC Corrections Services (715-848-3202) within one business day of release. Comply with pretrial monitoring through ATTIC Correctional Services at Level (4) supervision with possible drug testing as determined by agency screening.

Clerk: Marisa; Case called: 1:57 pm 
State appears by ADA Jonathan Barnett; Defendant appears by Zoom Video from MCJ with Atty Greg Venturini in person. 
Reading Waived. Reserve Jurisdiction. Deft is on PO hold. 
Prelim Time Limits Preserved. 

Argument re: bond. 
COURT ORDERS: $5,000 cash bond - CONDITIONS: 
- Absolute sobriety from and no possession of controlled substances except prescriptions taken as prescribed. 
- Report to ATTIC Corrections Services within one business day of release. Comply with pretrial monitoring through ATTIC Correctional Services at Level 4 supervision with possible drug testing as determined by agency screening.
